University of Minnesota
General Extension Division
Minneapolis 14
Radio Station KUOM
770 ON YOUR DIAL
30 September 1952
Mr* Gray don Ausmus
WUQA, University of Alabama
University of Alabama
Dear Graydon:
I nave your letter of September 22 relative to Wynn and the others*
When I was in New York last week I checked with Warren Bower. He would not
be interested in the position. Upon thinking the matter over carefully, I am
inclined to suggest that we not consider the other candidate whom I was supposed
to investigate, That means that the two names on ray list may be crossed off.
I think we ought to meet the candidates prior to the convention. There will
be enough things to do at the convention without getting mixed up with that, too.
I say that in spite of the fact tnat I am extremely reluctant to travel anywhere
at this points our tremendous television developments here at the University of
Minnesota, preparation for the convention, and the other projects that I have to
take care of, have just swamped me. However, if worse comes to worse, I might be
able to run down to Chicago for a day’s session.
I have a tentative commitment for October 11-15 but could arrange a day in
Chicago on the 18th if necessary. And in a pinch I might be able to come down for
the 11th or 12th although I should very much rather not.
In this connection may I repeat the proposal which I threw out in Urbana:
that we meet in some place like Chicago or Detroit rather than in a spot like ^ast
Lansing or Urbana. It takes almost an extra day to go and come from planes like
Michigan State or the University of Illinois on account of the need to change
transportation and the difficulty of obtaining direct connections. But if we meet
in Chicago, for example,-- which would be ray first choice — we could all reach it
in a hurry.
I was in New York for a couple of days last week and talked to Sy to bring
him up to date on NAEB developments. I was not quite clear in my own mind about
the projected meeting of the Board of Directors and the Adult Education Committee
on November 2, 3 and U# Would you write to him to give him the dope so we can
make our plans? It is important that I know about this as soon as possible so
that I may reserve rooms for the group here.
I trust you television plans are developing well in Alabama. Ours are doing
very well here right now.
With best personal regards.
BP:CJM
Burton Paulu
Manager
